title: Fighting The Spiritual Battle for Your Marriage
itunes:author: Guests: Jason & Tori Benham
itunes:summary:
Jason and Tori Benham struggled with conflict until they realized marriage is a spiritual battle. Fighting together for their marriage rather than against each other transformed their relationship. In this conversation, you’ll hear practical tips about working through conflict, overcoming destructive thought patterns towards your spouse, and reigniting godly jealousy for your husband or wife.

Receive the book "Beauty in Battle" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-06-29?refcd=1430803

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/fighting-the-spiritual-battle-for-your-marriage/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
